name: The Laboratory
description:
This laboratory has lots of stuff in it.  Beakers,
flasks, burners, tongs, mortars and pestles, jars filled
with normal things, jars filled with abnormal things, jars
filled with things you'd rather not think about...
A search could reveal many things...

extra_descriptions.keywords: beaker beakers flask flasks burner burners tong tongs
extra_descriptions.description: Looks like normal, fragile lab equipment to you.

extra_descriptions.keywords: mortar mortars pestle pestles jar jars
extra_descriptions.description: Looks like normal, fragile lab equipment to you.
